name: Make coffee the hard way
description:
Make coffee the hard way.

A lot of procrastination went into this Ludum Dare. We ran out of time in the end, but the game does have an ending and music.

WebGL version is available to play here.

-----------
Controls:
-----------
Click and drag things.
You can restart the game with R and turn objects with A and D.

Code by: https://twitter.com/fatsopanda
Art by: https://twitter.com/Ivdza_
